txt.en: You discovered that half-orcs had ransacked the vestiges of a camp-site, taking something away with them.

'You say you saw tracks leading southwards? These half-orcs clearly serve Saruman and are bearing their prize to Isengard.

'From what you say, they only have a single horse between them, so it is likely a pack-horse, rather than a mount. You should be able to catch them.

'Fortunately, our scouts saw such a pair of half-orcs to the east and a little south of here, almost due south of the camp-site. Hurry! You must recover whatever they took from the camp-site.'

The half-orcs were seen to the east and a little south of Echad Eregion, almost due south of the Company's camp-site.\n\nGolgallon told you to hunt down the half-orcs and recover whatever they took from the camp-site.
'The second half-orc is alone now and headed south? That is troubling, for it means he may be using the horse as a mount.\n\n'He has a strong enough lead, but perhaps there is yet time....'
Golgallon is at Echad Eregion, west and north of where you found Thl没k.\n\nYou should return to Golgallon with tidings of your encounter with Thl没k.
'You must catch the half-orcs and recover whatever it is they took from the Company's camp-site. Such a pair of half-orcs was seen a distance to the east and a little south of here.'

'You are too late, [placeholder]. My companion is already headed south with our prize... Sharkey will soon know everything he needs to find that precious thing he seeks. I am not about to let you hinder its delivery... die!'
Find half-orcs bearing the item from the Company's camp-site
Talk to Golgallon at Echad Eregion
